title: Cardano Developer Academy
description: The Cardano ecosystem needs more skilled smart contract developers to develop more dApps, and to reach its full potential.
solution: Moonar is a developer academy for Cardano. It combines amazing course content, a code editor, and Plutus dev container.
experience: I am the founder and operator of https://skillmix.io. I wrote the entire LMS frontend, backend, and lab service. I also am content director.
